mapper.sql: id, department_task_id, project_id, name, description, assignee_id, status, priority, start_date, end_date, progress, progress_note, sort_order, completed_at, created_at, updated_at, deleted
mapper.select: SELECT FROM task WHERE department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, created_at ASC
SELECT FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT FROM task WHERE assignee_id = #{assigneeId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM task WHERE department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND deleted = 0 GROUP BY status
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted = 0 GROUP BY status
SELECT FROM task WHERE assignee_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 AND status IN ('pending', 'in_progress') ORDER BY end_date ASC, priority DESC

SELECT FROM task WHERE deleted = 0 AND status IN ('pending', 'in_progress') AND end_date < CURDATE() ORDER BY end_date ASC
